title: Deserted landscape
brief_description: Material for this film was shot by the WEA Film Society in 1959 with the co-operation of various South Australian welfare organisations, with Ian Davidson as photographer and editor. It was subsequently made into a completed film, with commentary written by Nancy Cato, by Davidson’s company Arkaba Films in 1966. The project was supported by the Workers Educational Association of South Australia.
